Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Southbound Reroute near North Blvd/Forest Ave
ShortDescription: Southbound 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Randolph, Marion, South Blvd and Harlem: due to, street blockage near  North Blvd/Forest Ave.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Randolph, Marion, South Blvd and Harlem: due to, street blockage near  North Blvd/Forest Ave.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Irving Park
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Addison, Cicero, Irving Park and Pulaski due to street blockage at Pulaski/Irving Park

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Addison, Cicero, Irving Park, then resume their normal route on Pulaski due to street blockage at Pulaski/Irving Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown, Green, Orange and Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown, Green, Orange and Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at State/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown, Green, Orange and Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at State/Lake. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
